overview: During the armed kidnapping of Fox Ryder by The Starr Family, Cassio drops a dime on an Avalon family member. Duke pistolwhips Brandon into the darkroom never expecting magnetic attraction for each other would explode. The star-crossed lovers soon rendezvous in a Hollywood Hills cabin, until tragedy strikes.In the end, the wrong person gets killed. A bloody turf war erupts. A powerful secret gets uncovered. And, Fox Ryder fucks both families like a velvet hammer.
title: The Velvet Mafia 2
